projects.name: SportsLock
projects.description: A revolutionary daily fantasy sports application built for a Chicago startup. Features real-time game updates, player statistics, live scoring, and an intuitive betting interface that makes it easy for users to create lineups and compete.

projects.name: Monologues
projects.description: An interactive digital artist book bringing the Four Monologues to life. Features elegant typography, smooth page transitions, immersive audio narration, and a reading experience that bridges traditional books with modern technology.

projects.name: Rhythm Rain
projects.description: An innovative mobile rhythm game that analyzes and syncs with your own music library. Features dynamic gameplay that adapts to any song's tempo and beats, custom visual effects, and competitive leaderboards.

projects.name: View Chicago
projects.description: A comprehensive self-guided architectural tour app developed in collaboration with the AIA and Columbia College. Features GPS-powered navigation, professional audio guides, detailed building information, and curated walking routes through Chicago's iconic architecture.

projects.name: Mark Sramek Portfolio
projects.description: A clean, professional portfolio website designed to showcase creative work. Features smooth scroll animations, responsive image galleries, and an elegant minimalist design that puts the focus on the work.
